languages.text: "Однако сам факт того, что технобрат Авель пытается на что-то намекнуть, показывает, что он более информирован чем я, либо проанализировал ситуацию на более глубоком уровне. Это — полезные данные".

"However, the very fact that Tech-Brother Abel is trying to hint at something points to him either being better informed than I am or having conducted a more in-depth analysis of the situation. That is useful information."
languages.original_text: "Однако сам факт того, что технобрат Авель пытается на что-то намекнуть, показывает, что он более информирован чем я, либо проанализировал ситуацию на более глубоком уровне. Это — полезные данные".

traits.locale_text: "However, the very fact that Tech-Brother Abel is trying to hint at something points to him either being better informed than me or having conducted a more in-depth analysis of the situation. That is useful data."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "However, the very fact that Tech-Brother Abel is trying to hint at something points to him either being better informed than me or having conducted a more in-depth analysis of the situation. That is useful data."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "However, the very fact that Tech-Brother Abel is trying to hint at something points to him either being better informed than I am or having conducted a more in-depth analysis of the situation. That is useful information."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "However, the very fact that Tech-Brother Abel is trying to hint at something points to him either being better informed than I am or having conducted a more in-depth analysis of the situation. That is useful information."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「ですが、技術同胞のアベルが何かを仄めかそうとしている事実は、彼が自分よりも情報を知っているのか、あるいはより詳しい状況分析をしたのかを示しています。これは有益な情報です」
languages.original_text: "However, the very fact that Tech-Brother Abel is trying to hint at something points to him either being better informed than I am or having conducted a more in-depth analysis of the situation. That is useful information."

traits.locale_text: 「ですが、技術同胞のアベルが何かを仄めかそうとしている事実は、彼が自分よりも情報を知っているのか、あるいはより詳しい状況分析をしたのかを示しています。これは有益な情報です」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “不过，技术兄弟亚伯试图暗示的事实表明，他要么比我更加了解情况，要么他对目前的形势进行了更加深入的分析。这是个有用的情报。”
languages.original_text: "However, the very fact that Tech-Brother Abel is trying to hint at something points to him either being better informed than I am or having conducted a more in-depth analysis of the situation. That is useful information."

traits.locale_text: “不过，技术兄弟亚伯试图暗示的事实表明，他要么比我更加了解情况，要么他对目前的形势进行了更加深入的分析。这是个有用的数据。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Allerdings deutet der bloße Umstand, dass Tech-Bruder Abel auf etwas hinweisen möchte, darauf hin, dass er entweder besser informiert ist als wir oder eine tiefergehende Analyse der Situation durchgeführt hat. Das ist eine nützliche Information."
languages.original_text: "However, the very fact that Tech-Brother Abel is trying to hint at something points to him either being better informed than I am or having conducted a more in-depth analysis of the situation. That is useful information."

traits.locale_text: "Allerdings deutet der Umstand an sich, dass Tech-Bruder Abel auf etwas hinweisen möchte, darauf hin, dass er entweder besser informiert ist als wir oder eine tiefergehende Analyse der Situation durchgeführt hat. Das sind nützliche Daten."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Pour autant, le seul fait qu'Abel cherche à nous aiguiller indique soit qu'il est mieux informé que moi, soit qu'il s'est livré à une analyse plus approfondie de la situation. Ce sont là des données utiles. »
languages.original_text: "However, the very fact that Tech-Brother Abel is trying to hint at something points to him either being better informed than I am or having conducted a more in-depth analysis of the situation. That is useful information."

traits.locale_text: « Pour autant, le seul fait qu'Abel cherche à nous aiguiller indique soit qu'il est mieux informé que moi, soit qu'il s'est livré à une analyse plus approfondie de la situation. Ce sont là des données utiles. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Sin embargo, el hecho de que el tecnohermano Abel esté intentando decirnos algo sugiere que está mejor informado que yo o que ha realizado un análisis más detallado de la situación. Esa información es útil».
languages.original_text: "However, the very fact that Tech-Brother Abel is trying to hint at something points to him either being better informed than I am or having conducted a more in-depth analysis of the situation. That is useful information."

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, el hecho de que el tecnohermano Abel esté intentando decirnos algo sugiere que está mejor informado que yo o que ha realizado un análisis más detallado de la situación. Esa información es útil».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Lakin Tekno Kardeş Abel'in bir şeylerin ipucunu vermeye çalıştığı gerçeği, ya onun benden daha fazla enformasyon sahibi olduğunu ya da durum üzerine daha derinlemesine bir analiz gerçekleştirdiğini işaret etmekte. Bu, işe yarar bir bilgi."
languages.original_text: "However, the very fact that Tech-Brother Abel is trying to hint at something points to him either being better informed than I am or having conducted a more in-depth analysis of the situation. That is useful information."

traits.locale_text: "Lakin Tekno Kardeş Abel'in bir şeylerin ipucunu vermeye çalıştığı gerçeği, ya onun benden daha fazla enformasyon sahibi olduğuna ya da durum üzerine daha derinlemesine bir analiz gerçekleştirdiğine işaret etmekte. Bu, işe yarar bir bilgi."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
